global_param.name: FROM
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Sender]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Name and adress of the sender, use Name:mail_address format.]

global_param.name: TO
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Recipient(s)]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Comma separated list of permanent recipients, e.g Name1:address1,Name2:address2, etc. Leave empty if you want only the share feature.]

global_param.name: SHARE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Enrich Shares]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Add a notification pane to the share mechanism, proposing the user to enter her email to be notified when the shared repository is modified]

global_param.name: ACTIONS
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Notify on...]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Comma-separated list of action on wich the notification should be sent]

global_param.name: SUBJECT
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Subject]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Subject to be displayed in the mail]

global_param.name: BODY
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Body]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Body of the email. You can use AJXP_USER, AJXP_FILE, AJXP_FOLDER and AJXP_ACTION keywords.]

global_param.name: MAILER
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Mailer]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Php mailer to use (see phpmail-lite documentation).'.]
